name: bnrel

body.origin:
|- wrel(ccbn)
-| wss(ccbn, cnv)
-| wrel(cnv)
-| wi(wss(ccbn, cnv), wi(wrel(cnv), wrel(ccbn)))
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CBan)
⊣ CBan ⊆ NrmCVec
⊣ Rel(NrmCVec)
⊣ (CBan ⊆ NrmCVec →(Rel(NrmCVec)→ Rel(CBan)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(ccbn)
-| wss(ccbn, cnv)
-| wrel(cnv)
-| wi(wss(ccbn, cnv), wi(wrel(cnv), wrel(ccbn)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CBan)
⊣ CBan ⊆ NrmCVec
⊣ Rel(NrmCVec)
⊣ (CBan ⊆ NrmCVec →(Rel(NrmCVec)→ Rel(CBan)))

body.origin:
|- wss(ccbn, cnv)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), ccbn), wcel(cv(hs0), cnv))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccbn)
-| diffsc(hs0, cnv)
body.pretty:
⊢ CBan ⊆ NrmCVec
⊣ (hs0 ∈ CBan → hs0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ d(hs0, CBan)
⊣ d(hs0, NrmCVec)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(ccbn)
-| wrel(cnv)
-| wi(wss(ccbn, cnv), wi(wrel(cnv), wrel(ccbn)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), ccbn), wcel(cv(hs0), cnv))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccbn)
-| diffsc(hs0, cnv)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CBan)
⊣ Rel(NrmCVec)
⊣ (CBan ⊆ NrmCVec →(Rel(NrmCVec)→ Rel(CBan)))
⊣ (hs0 ∈ CBan → hs0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ d(hs0, CBan)
⊣ d(hs0, NrmCVec)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(ccbn)
-| wrel(cnv)
-| wi(wss(ccbn, cnv), wi(wrel(cnv), wrel(ccbn)))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccbn)
-| diffsc(hs0, cnv)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CBan)
⊣ Rel(NrmCVec)
⊣ (CBan ⊆ NrmCVec →(Rel(NrmCVec)→ Rel(CBan)))
⊣ d(hs0, CBan)
⊣ d(hs0, NrmCVec)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(ccbn)
-| wi(wss(ccbn, cnv), wi(wrel(cnv), wrel(ccbn)))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccbn)
-| diffsc(hs0, cnv)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CBan)
⊣ (CBan ⊆ NrmCVec →(Rel(NrmCVec)→ Rel(CBan)))
⊣ d(hs0, CBan)
⊣ d(hs0, NrmCVec)

comment: The class of all complex Banach spaces is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
